Hemet.Mt. San Jacinto College: Mt. San Jacinto College (MSJC) is a community college in Riverside County, California, United States and is part of the California Community College system. MSJC consists of five locations:San Jacinto (San Jacinto Campus, Menifee (Menifee Valley Campus), Banning (San Gorgonio Pass Campus) and Temecula (Temecula Education Complex and Temecula Higher Education Complex THEC).
